pages.text: When the amount of $(aura) in an area exceeds natural amounts by a bit, and there is some $(l:effects/effect_powder)Powder of Starry Skies$() in the vicinity, any magical botanists who have also dabbled in $(thing)astral sorcery$() will find that the levels of observable $(thing)starlight$() drastically increase, causing any nearby apparatus that use it to be boosted in the process.
